item.title: Lavatory Waste Systems – System Does Not Leak

remarks.para: Individual components may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Associated components are deactivated or isolated, and
Associated system components verified not to have leaks.

note.para: Any portion of system which is operative may be used.
If flush motor is inoperative, use bottled water to rinse bowl. Lavatory is considered operative provided system does not leak.

placard.para: Placard Lavatory System component "______ DEACTIVATED, DO NOT USE" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: If flush motor is inoperative, open and collar flush motor circuit breaker (P11S25).

note.para: Lav Service Equipment, i.e., dump valve cable, plumbing between tank and service panel, may be deferred provided an alternate method can be used to service the lav.
